name: FAS for MagicDraw
short_description:
Functional Architectures enable modeling systems independent of their target technology. Their systematic modeling with the FAS method requires several steps, some of them being determined by general rules. The FAS plugin for MagicDraw automates these steps, allowing the Architect to stay focused on those activities that require an architect's expertise. 

The FAS plugin for MagicDraw requires MagicDraw 17.0 or higher with an installed SysML plugin.

MagicDraw version 17.0.1 SP2 offers the plugin for download from the vendor site via the "Resource-plugin manager". Ver. 17.0.1 equals 1.0 here.

Here are installation instructions for the version of the plugin that is offered on this site: http://sourceforge.net/projects/fas4md/files/ReadMe.txt/download.

More:

Tutorial
http://sourceforge.net/projects/fas4md/files/FAS_plugin_tutorial.pdf/download


User Guide
http://sourceforge.net/projects/fas4md/files/FAS%20plugin%20for%20MagicDraw%20-%20User%20Guide.pdf/download
summary: Functional Architectures for Systems with SysML - Plugin for MagicDraw
